    • Method Detail

      • getBodyPart

        public static javax.mail.Part getBodyPart(javax.mail.Part actualEmail)
                                   throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Retrieve the main part of the message (recursively):
        • The part of the message when it contains only one part
        • The part with text or HTML mimetype if only one part with one of that mimetype
        • The second part with text or HTML mimetype if there are two text or HTML parts
        Parameters:
        actualEmail - the message
        Returns:
        the body of the message
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read

      • getAlternativePart

        public static javax.mail.Part getAlternativePart(javax.mail.Part actualEmail)
                                          throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Retrieve the alternative part of the message (recursively). The alternative is useful when sending HTML email that may be unreadable on some email clients. For example, a smartphone will display the 2 or 3 first lines as a summary. Many smartphones will take the HTML message as-is and will display HTML tags instead of content of email. Alternative is used to provide a textual visualization of the message that will be readable by any system.

        The alternative of the message is either:

        • null if there is only one part
        • null if there is only one text or HTML part
        • the first part if there are more than one text or HTML part
        Parameters:
        actualEmail - the message
        Returns:
        the alternative part of the message if exists, null otherwise
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read

      • getTextualParts

        public static List<javax.mail.Part> getTextualParts(javax.mail.Part actualEmail)
                                             throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Get the whole list of "textual" parts (text or HTML mimetypes).
        Parameters:
        actualEmail - the message
        Returns:
        the list of "textual" parts
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read

      • getContent

        public static byte[] getContent(javax.mail.Part part)
                         throws IOException,
                                javax.mail.MessagingException
        Get the content as byte array of a particular part.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getAttachment

        public static javax.mail.BodyPart getAttachment(javax.mail.Multipart multipart,
                                                String filename)
                                         throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Get a particular attachment (found using exact filename field).
        Parameters:
        multipart - the email that contains several parts
        filename - the name of the attachment to find
        Returns:
        the found attachment or null
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read

      • getAttachment

        public static javax.mail.BodyPart getAttachment(javax.mail.Multipart multipart,
                                                Predicate<javax.mail.BodyPart> filter)
                                         throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Get a particular attachment (found using provided predicate). If several attachments match the predicate, only the first one is retrieved.
        Parameters:
        multipart - the email that contains several parts
        filter - the predicate used to find the attachment
        Returns:
        the found attachment or null
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read

      • getAttachments

        public static List<javax.mail.BodyPart> getAttachments(javax.mail.Multipart multipart,
                                                       Predicate<javax.mail.BodyPart> filter)
                                                throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Get a list of attachments that match the provided predicate.
        Parameters:
        multipart - the email that contains several parts
        filter - the predicate used to find the attachments
        Returns:
        the found attachments or empty list
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - when message can't be read
